func:
flow.set("dcoll", msg.payload.collections[0].collection_id);



return msg;

name: poll

func: flow.set("company", msg.payload.replace("\n",""));

flow.set("companyurl", msg.payload.replace("\n",""));
return msg;

msg.payload = 'curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST -u "apikey:' + flow.get("wakey") + '" -d @/root/assistant.json "' + flow.get("waurl") + '/v1/workspaces/' + msg.wksp + '?append=false&version=2020-04-01"';

return msg;
flow.set("instnum", msg.payload.replace("\n",""));

name: translate
Router
SMS

func:
msg.payload = {};
return msg;

name: appointment
func: return msg;

name: Receive text messages
func:
if (msg.payload.From === ("+" + flow.get("tnum")))
    return msg;

name: message
join
end
